name: Raw Butternut Squash Salad With Raisins and Ginger
description: This is a very simple yet very delicious salad, and it appeals to ominvores and vegans. The natural sweetness of raisins and squash are cut through by sherry vinegar and black pepper, and ginger lends complexity.
keywords: butternut squash, raisins, fall, winter, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 butternut squash about 1 1/2 pounds, peeled, seeded and grated
1 to 2 tablespoons sherry vinegar, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the squash, raisins, oil, vinegar and ginger in a salad bowl; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Toss, then taste and adjust the seasoning. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate for up to several hours.

video.name: Butternut Squash Salad
video.description: Mark Bittman makes a simple yet scrumptious raw vegetable salad.
